name: Scoop
body:
### Scoop installs the tools and utilities you need ``` PS> scoop install curl ```
### Get comfortable on the Windows command line Whether you're looking for familiar tools from other operating systems or you just want alternatives to the Powershell `Verb-Noun` way of doing things, Scoop helps you get [the programs you need](https://github.com/lukesampson/scoop/tree/master/bucket), with a minimum amount of point-and-clicking.
# Installs in seconds Make sure [Powershell 3](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=34595) is installed, then run: ``` iex (new-object net.webclient).downloadstring('https://get.scoop.sh') ``` **Note:** if you get an error you might need to change the execution policy (i.e. enable Powershell) with `set-executionpolicy unrestricted -s cu -f`
